snippet.title: Sword Art Online: Lost Song - PS4/PS Vita - Take flight for adventure! (English Trailer)
snippet.description:
A new Sword Art Online adventure begins. Take flight in the world of Alfheim Online! Join Kirito, Leafa, Asuna and the rest of the party in a world of fantasy and action on PS4 and PS Vita. Join the community on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/pages/Sword-Art-Online-Video-Games/308419149358892

Follow us: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu
Visit us: https://www.bandainamcogames.eu and talk about this game, share tips & win goodies at http://www.bandainamcogames.eu/community
